content: the leaf 3 double_crochet in the back loop 2 double_crochet a double_crochet-increase in the back loop of the next stitch close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12 leaves of 5 fpdc separated by 17 double_crochet in the back loop magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #33 in this round we will ignore the lonely double_crochet s in the middle between two double_crochet-increase s repeat 12 times single_crochet in the picot made in round #26 skip the lonely double_crochet between double_crochet-increase s 7 double_crochet in the back loop 3 double_crochet in the back loop of the last ordinary double_crochet before the leaf 2 fpdc together 1 fpdc 2 fpdc together 3 double_crochet in the back loop of the 1st ordinary double_crochet after the leaf 7 double_crochet in the back loop close the round with a slip_stitch we have alternately 12 leaves and single_crochet s separated by 10 double_crochet on each side round #34 repeat 12 times fpdc around the single_crochet made into a picot 10 double_crochet in the back loop 3 fpdc together to close the leaf 10 double_crochet in the back loop close the round with a slip_stitch we have closed 12 leaves having 10 double_crochet on each side we also have lonely fpdc s in between round #35 make 1 chain to start the round from appropriate height repeat 12 times 1 puff around fpdc 10 double_crochet in the back loop 2 double_crochet a double_crochet-increase into the back loop of the closed leaf 10 double_crochet in the back loop close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12 puff stitches separated by 10+2+10 = 22 double_crochet s i forgot to take a photo for this round round #36 finally an easy round make double_crochet s in the back loop all around with an exception make 2 double_crochet a double_crochet-increase into the back loop of every puff close the round with a slip stitch we have 12* 22+2 = 12*24 double_crochet s all around round #37 another easy round make double_crochet s in the back loop all around with an exception somewhere in the middle between the leaf and the puff make 2 double_crochet a double_crochet-increase in the back loop if you want to be really pedantic there will be 11 double_crochet s between the neighboring increases don t close the round with a slip_stitch instead pull up a loop on the wrong side through the 1st double_crochet made we have 12* 24+2 = 12*26 double_crochet s all around magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #38 make bphdc all around close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12*26 =312 bphdc all around round #39 repeat 312/2 =156 times 1 half_double_crochet 1 chain skip next stitch close the round with a slip_stitch we have 156 half_double_crochet and 156 chain all around round #40 make 1 chain to start the round from appropriate height repeat 156 times 1 puff around half_double_crochet single_crochet in the 1ch-space close the round with
